knimeNode.name: Adjust P-Values
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is designed to adjust P-values for Multiple Testing.

tab.name: Numbers input
tab.option: name of the column which contains the p-values

Specify which method shall be used for the correction
Holm
Hochberg
Hommel
Bonferroni multiply p-values with number of performed tests
BH Benjamini-Hochberg correction to control the FDR
BY Benjamini-Yecutieli correction
FDR same as Benjamini-Hochberg
None Do not correct p-values
Specify the number of tests to correct for (or choose 0 if the number of tests is the number of rows in the input data)
Check this if the column with adjusted p-values shall replace the original p-value column
Name of the column which contains the adjusted p-values in the output data (no matter if it replaces the original column or not)

ports.inPort: Input Data with one column containing p-values.
ports.outPort: As Input Data but with one column containing corrected p-values.
